title: Live from Toronto at the Danforth Music Hall 2019
description:
This week's episode was recorded live in Toronto, Canada at the Danforth Music Hall! The first case is "Larpe Diem" Then, the judge and bailiff rule on cases having to do with a cat litter box, a photo of college friend, and a shared YouTube account during Swift Justice.

Thank you to Robbie Newell for naming this week's case! To suggest a title for a future episode, follow Judge John Hodgman on Facebook. We regularly put out a call for submissions.

--

SUBSCRIBE TO THIS PODCAST in APPLE PODCASTS or the RSS FEED
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
